html:
Slide on a cosmic ray
Orbit the sun
Then sit at a table
And eat your supper
When the night comes
And you get tired
Rest well in your dream
Until the morning comes
The jobs are done already
Time to write a poem
Smoke a cigarette
And chill
Our bell woken up again
As itâ€™s programmed
So the local priest can
Have his rest as well
title: Cosmic ray
